properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.allow-jms-type
properties.description: Used for JMS users to allow the JMSType header from the JMS spec to specify a FQN classname to use to unmarshal to.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.allow-unmarshall-type
properties.description: If enabled then Jackson is allowed to attempt to use the CamelJacksonUnmarshalType header during the unmarshalling. This should only be enabled when desired to be used.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.auto-discover-object-mapper
properties.description: If set to true then Jackson will look for an objectMapper to use from the registry

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.auto-discover-schema-resolver
properties.description: When not disabled, the SchemaResolver will be looked up into the registry

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.collection-type
properties.description: Refers to a custom collection type to lookup in the registry to use. This option should rarely be used, but allows using different collection types than java.util.Collection based as default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.content-type-header
properties.description: Whether the data format should set the Content-Type header with the type from the data format. For example application/xml for data formats marshalling to XML, or application/json for data formats marshalling to JSON

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.disable-features
properties.description: Set of features to disable on the Jackson com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper. The features should be a name that matches a enum from com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.SerializationFeature, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationFeature, or com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.MapperFeature Multiple features can be separated by comma

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.enable-features
properties.description: Set of features to enable on the Jackson com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper. The features should be a name that matches a enum from com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.SerializationFeature, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationFeature, or com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.MapperFeature Multiple features can be separated by comma

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the jackson data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.include
properties.description: If you want to marshal a pojo to JSON, and the pojo has some fields with null values. And you want to skip these null values, you can set this option to NON_NULL

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.json-view
properties.description: When marshalling a POJO to JSON you might want to exclude certain fields from the JSON output. With Jackson you can use JSON views to accomplish this. This option is to refer to the class which has JsonView annotations

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.module-class-names
properties.description: To use custom Jackson modules com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.Module specified as a String with FQN class names. Multiple classes can be separated by comma.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.module-refs
properties.description: To use custom Jackson modules referred from the Camel registry. Multiple modules can be separated by comma.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.naming-strategy
properties.description: If set then Jackson will use the the defined Property Naming Strategy.Possible values are: LOWER_CAMEL_CASE, LOWER_DOT_CASE, LOWER_CASE, KEBAB_CASE, SNAKE_CASE and UPPER_CAMEL_CASE

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.object-mapper
properties.description: Lookup and use the existing ObjectMapper with the given id when using Jackson.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.pretty-print
properties.description: To enable pretty printing output nicely formatted. Is by default false.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.schema-resolver
properties.description: Optional schema resolver used to lookup schemas for the data in transit.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.timezone
properties.description: If set then Jackson will use the Timezone when marshalling/unmarshalling. This option will have no effect on the others Json DataFormat, like gson, fastjson and xstream.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.unmarshal-type
properties.description: Class name of the java type to use when unmarshalling

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.use-default-object-mapper
properties.description: Whether to lookup and use default Jackson ObjectMapper from the registry.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.jackson.use-list
properties.description: To unmarshal to a List of Map or a List of Pojo.
